instructions.instruction: Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Created-By: 16.0-b13 (Sun Microsystems Inc.) Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-Name: SQLExplorer Plugin Bundle-Vendor: SQL Explorer Project (eclipsesql.sourceforge.net) Bundle-ActivationPolicy: lazy Ant-Version: Apache Ant 1.7.0 Bundle-ClassPath: sqlexplorer.jar,lib/log4j.jar,lib/rowset.jar,lib/dom4j.jar,lib/fw.jar,lib/hibernate3.2.4.sp1.jar,lib/poi-3.5-FINAL-20090928.jar,lib/commons-logging.jar Bundle-Version: 3.5.1.v20100730_SR4 eforge.squirrel_sql.fw.sql.dbobj,net.sourceforge.squirrel_sql.fw.sql.dbobj.adapter,net.sourceforge.squirrel_sql.fw.util,net.sourceforge.squirrel_sql.fw.util.beanwrapper,net.sourceforge.squirrel_sql.fw.util.log,net.sourceforge.squirrel_sql.fw.xml,org.eclipse.jface.preference Require-Bundle: org.eclipse.ui;bundle-version="3.2.0",org.eclipse.core.runtime;bundle-version="3.2.0",org.eclipse.core.resources;bundle-version="3.2.0",org.eclipse.ui.ide;bundle-version="3.2.0",org.eclipse.ui.workbench.texteditor;bundle-version="3.2.0",org.eclipse.jface.text;bundle-version="3.2.0",org.eclipse.ui.editors;bundle-version="3.2.0",org.eclipse.core.expressions Bundle-Activator: net.sourceforge.sqlexplorer.plugin.SQLExplorerPlugin Bundle-SymbolicName: net.sourceforge.sqlexplorer; singleton:=true Eclipse-LazyStart: true Bundle-RequiredExecutionEnvironment: J2SE-1.5 Bundle-Localization: plugin

Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Bundle-Name: SQLExplorer Help Bundle-Version: 3.5.1.v20100730_SR4 Require-Bundle: org.eclipse.help Created-By: 16.0-b13 (Sun Microsystems Inc.) Bundle-SymbolicName: net.sourceforge.sqlexplorer.help; singleton:=true Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-Vendor: SQL Explorer Project (eclipsesql.sourceforge.net) Ant-Version: Apache Ant 1.7.0

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value:
SQL Explorer is a thin SQL client for querying and exploring JDBC Compliant databases. Changes in 3.5.1: +. new execute current sql action (CTRL+ALT+ENTER) and changeable key binding (patch #2725105 by joco01) +. fixed bug #2827324, rounded float values in MS-Sql +. feature #2827391, problem with auto completion +. fixed bug #2830545, fill db structure view for current database +. extended database(catalog) support for MySql,Sybase, MS-Sql +. added New to File menu, moved preferences menu item down +. re-added export to HTML and XLS action
SR1: +. use getDate for DATE sql type, needed for Teradata, no problems detected with MySql/msSql/Postgres see https://sourceforge.net/projects/eclipsesql/forums/forum/450663/topic/3435783 +. added option to strip comments before executing SQL see https://sourceforge.net/projects/eclipsesql/forums/forum/450662/topic/3423052
SR2: +. added patch from patl9 fixing problems with alias saving, http://sourceforge.net/tracker/?func=detail&atid=725495&aid=2891491&group_id=132863 +. select complete row in result set table +. fixed ClasCastException for PostgreSQL and Oracle if strip comments is enabled +. added check for lines starting with \ in PostgreSQL +. added batch execution results
SR3: +. fixed IndexOutOfBoundsException in execute SQL chunk +. Patch #2924692 by ashinger, fixed some problems in JDBC driver preferences +. used commands for SQL actions, new context menu entries and editor tool bar buttons +. cleanup deprecations for preferences
SR3b: +. fixed Bug #2948449 NoSuchMethodeError, see https://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=2948449&group_id=132863&atid=725495

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value:
SQL Explorer is a thin SQL client for querying and exploring JDBC Compliant databases. Changes in 3.5.1: +. new execute current sql action (CTRL+ALT+ENTER) and changeable key binding (patch #2725105 by joco01) +. fixed bug #2827324, rounded float values in MS-Sql +. feature #2827391, problem with auto completion +. fixed bug #2830545, fill db structure view for current database +. extended database(catalog) support for MySql,Sybase, MS-Sql +. added New to File menu, moved preferences menu item down +. re-added export to HTML and XLS action
SR1: +. use getDate for DATE sql type, needed for Teradata, no problems detected with MySql/msSql/Postgres see https://sourceforge.net/projects/eclipsesql/forums/forum/450663/topic/3435783 +. added option to strip comments before executing SQL see https://sourceforge.net/projects/eclipsesql/forums/forum/450662/topic/3423052
SR2: +. added patch from patl9 fixing problems with alias saving, http://sourceforge.net/tracker/?func=detail&atid=725495&aid=2891491&group_id=132863 +. select complete row in result set table +. fixed ClasCastException for PostgreSQL and Oracle if strip comments is enabled +. added check for lines starting with \ in PostgreSQL +. added batch execution results
SR3: +. fixed IndexOutOfBoundsException in execute SQL chunk +. Patch #2924692 by ashinger, fixed some problems in JDBC driver preferences +. used commands for SQL actions, new context menu entries and editor tool bar buttons +. cleanup deprecations for preferences
SR3b: +. fixed Bug #2948449 NoSuchMethodeError, see https://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=2948449&group_id=132863&atid=725495
